topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: lumu - LDAP users manager
short_description:
Self-hosted web interface for management of user and group accounts  on LDAP servers. The server part includes perl daemon, which accepts only json-rpc requests via HTTP. Static files (html, js, images, etc) must be distributed via one of apache httpd, nginx or similar server.
The web interface uses jQuery for look nicely. In the same time the interface is not overloaded due performance reason.

The main difference from other management utilities, like phpmyldapadmin is that this utility was created for humans. The main goal is automate and simplify common tasks of system administrators. You will not need to know how to create ldif files, what kind of attributes are required and which are not.

From sysadmins for sysadmins.

Early, this project contained two perl scripts for user/group management. You may find them in branches directory on svn. Supporting of these files freezed for unlimited time, sorry.
summary: manage your ldap via web interface
